component.name: PosterRowList
component.script:
function init() m.top.numRows = 1 m.top.showRowLabel = [true] m.top.showRowCounter = [true]
m.top.rowHeights = [220] m.top.rowItemSize = [ [196, 220] ]
m.top.rowItemSpacing = [ [20, 0] ]
m.top.rowFocusAnimationStyle = "fixedFocusWrap" m.top.focusable = true m.top.content = GetRowListContent()
m.top.visible = true
end function
function sizeChanged() m.top.itemSize = [m.top.width, m.top.height] end function
function GetRowListContent() as object
data = CreateObject("roSGNode", "ContentNode") row = data.CreateChild("ContentNode") row.title = "Example Playlist"
for i = 1 to 20 item = row.CreateChild("PosterRowListItemData") item.posterUrl = "pkg:/images/thumbnail.jpg" item.labelText = "This is item" + stri(i) end for
return data
end function
